meanings.definition: Already cut into pieces before being sold or used.
meanings.sent1: The precut vegetables made cooking dinner much quicker.
meanings.sent2: I bought a precut cake for the party.
meanings.sent3: The precut fruit looked like a colorful puzzle waiting to be assembled.
meanings.sent4: Her precut hair framed her face perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The precut fabric pieces were neatly arranged in the sewing kit.

meanings.sent1: I precut the paper for the craft project.
meanings.sent2: She precut the ingredients before starting to cook.
meanings.sent3: He precut the grass in a zigzag pattern just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The chef precut the vegetables with precision and skill.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter precut the wood to save time during the construction.
